markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blade Byrnie](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1843)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 15 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Instead of chain links, this _+1 [chain shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)_ is assembled from metal “leaves” that each resemble a small blade.

<document level="2" id="action-1537" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"

pfs="Standard"
>
Blade Byrnie

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 13"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blade Byrnie (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 15 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The armor is a _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) chain shirt_. The daggers are _+2 greater striking daggers_.
